items.name: Basic Weapon
items.description: A basic weapon. It has no special properties but it's better than a stick.

items.name: Secondary Weapon
items.description: Secondary weapons such as kunais, needles, or shurikens.

items.name: Chakra Weapon
items.description: A weapon with basic appearance but capable of conducting chakra.

items.name: Basic Camping Scroll
items.description: A basic camping tent and some materials for making fire. At least you aren't sleeping on the floor

items.name: Advanced Camping Scroll
items.description: For camping comfortable and with style.

items.name: Seal Tags
items.description: Pre-made and ready-to-use seal tags. (Make sure to indicate their type in your inventory)

items.name: Bribe
items.description: A small bribe prepared beforehand. You never know when you're going to need them to look the other way.

items.name: Inn Token
items.description: Your proof of your reservation for a room at the local hotel.
